turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order a coffee drink from Starbucks coffee

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which Starbucks location would you like me to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 690 East Horizon drive in Henderson, NV

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, when would you need it by?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: As soon as possible

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A cinnamon shortbread frappuccino

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of milk do you want with it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Whole milk

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want an extra shot of espresso or anything?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No extra shots, thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, definitely

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The biggest one, I think it's the venti

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I'll go ahead and order the cinnamon shortbread venti frappucino

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: no problem, it will be ready in about ten minutes and will be waiting for you at the Starbucks location on Horizon

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you, just send the receipt to my phone

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Already done, anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that was all thank you very much for your help

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thank you very much
